website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, durable option with good airflow, but may develop a noise problem the longer you run it.
pros: Available with red or transparent blades
Has both high and low settings
Pushes out a good amount of air
cons: Reports that this fan gets progressively louder the longer it runs
Some buyers felt it was cheaply made

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small office
customer_reviews.text: I work in a small enclosed office. Two of us sharing a space intended for one person. Even on high, the fan noise is just a low white noise that is easy to ignore. No rattling or anything. My office mate don't even notice it. It is small so it fits on my desk and it moves a lot of air. The picture gives you an idea of scale.
customer_reviews.author: TeeOllie

customer_reviews.title: Broken after two months
customer_reviews.text: This thing broke down after less than two months of use. Used for about 6 hours per day, 4 days per week.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo mcc

customer_reviews.title: Great breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these USB powered fans because we live in Louisiana where it's usually HOT and our power goes out more often than I would like. I have a few power banks that I plug the fans into when the power goes out, and this one seems to be my favorite so far! It's surprisingly strong! When on high, I can sleep comfortably when I set this on a chair at the foot of my bed. The others I own don't produce anywhere near the same strength breeze.
customer_reviews.author: JoanneKC

customer_reviews.title: ... it's not really enough air flow for how I like things at night
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my night stand but it's not really enough air flow for how I like things at night. I have no overhead fan in my room and don't like to run the AC at night so was hoping this would work. I've since replaced it with a larger fan and took this to work to use as an actual desk fan. For this purpose, which it's obviously intended for, it's PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Mundokiir

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for people without sensory overload problems
customer_reviews.text: This fan is certainly quiet, sturdy, and dependable. However, the two speeds never meet my fan needs. Slow tends to not be nearly enough, whereas fast is uncomfortable for my occasional sensory-based anxiety issues. I don't like having to choose between keeping cool enough and staying physically relaxed. If you don't have deep-seated anxiety issues, you'll probably be much happier with this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie GriffinTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases!
customer_reviews.text: This fan has worked perfectly in keeping me cooler while at work. It is nice and quiet on low, and for the most part - low has been enough to cool me off. On high, it is still pretty quiet, but may be heard slightly by someone sitting very close to you. I get hot easily, so I was shocked when high was almost too much after awhile. I've only put it on high 2 or 3 times, but run it on low all day.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Oltmanns

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase - Very Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan to use on my desk at work. It's easily adjustable and keeps me cooled off. I'm surprised at how quiet it is. I spend a lot of time on the phone, so I can't have anything that provides too much background noise. I've pretty much use it every day since purchasing at the end of September. It's been almost 60 days, and I haven't detected any increase in noise. I don't expect it to last forever, and I will definitely purchase again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: luckof8

customer_reviews.title: It's working good.
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working great. Bought this to cool down my son's desktop computer and it dropped it 10 degrees. He had to take off the cover on his computer and this little fan is doing its job. He has it set on high and it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Bluerose

customer_reviews.title: It's nothing terrible, but having run it only 15 hours a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've has this for a little more than a month now and it's started to make a faint rattling sound when it runs. It's nothing terrible, but having run it only 15 hours a week or so in that time frame, it seems a little early to be loosening up and making random noises.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan
customer_reviews.text: This little baby is quiet, gets cold fast, and so cute. You will not be disappointed. I share a office with women going through hot/cold flashes, they love to keep the room hot. I like it cool. I put on my little fan and it keeps me comfortable throughout my day. Everybody's happy.
customer_reviews.author: jewelbutter

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: This arrived broken so I had to return it. One of the fan blades was completely broken off. It looked like deliberate damage. I am sure I got one that was not new and had been returned before. The box even was questionable. My partner ordered me a differen fan from a different place.
customer_reviews.author: Distraida

customer_reviews.title: Quiet is right!
customer_reviews.text: I can't hear this fan and it's very close to me (about an arm's length). But it helps move the air around, which is why I wanted it. If you want a strong wind, this is not the fan for you. If you want a bit of air circulation and don't want to hear the whirring of the motor, then this *is* the fan for you.
customer_reviews.author: nenheedra

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3-4 months ago. Use it several hours daily. Very quiet. using with low speed (2 watts)setting on nightstand directed at torso and I can stay almost as comfortable as using overhead ceiling fan on low setting (11 watts)with an 80% saving in kilowatts. Still just as quiet as day #1.
customer_reviews.author: oldguy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful solution for an office environment!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! I use it at my desk everyday for work. I work in an open office environment so I wanted something that wouldn't disrupt my neighbors. This fan does the job and does it well. It moves a lot of air quietly. My desk neighbor noticed it and liked it so much she ordered one too! When I turn it off I wonder how I ever worked without it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: It was noisy and it would vibrate pretty hard to the point i had to put misc ...
customer_reviews.text: I had another USB desk fan. It was noisy and it would vibrate pretty hard to the point i had to put misc items on the legs to keep it still. Then it broke on me lol. However this CAMTOP fan seems to be EXCELLENT. the motor is quiet. its strong and blows pretty good. to the point i have to turn it off sometimes bc it makes me a little chilly. it also doesnt move on my desk from vibration which is HUGE. also just the sound of the motor, sounds like its much higher quality than my previous fan. 10 /10 would buy again. Esp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Oveson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, reliable, perfectly sized desk fan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to have at my desk in a very quiet cube farm at work. As someone who overheats really easily, this has been fan-tastic to have at my desk. It runs continuously for 6-8 hours a day, and has no sign of stopping. Even if it broke tomorrow, I'd buy the same fan again because of the price and function.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't go wrong with this. I plug it into my laptop station at work with the USB cord provided. It's super quiet and it puts out a lot of air. I usually use it on low. I couldn't believe how much air it put out. Since it uses a USB, I didn't have to crawl around under my desk to plug it in or unplug something else to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! Fits great at my desk and it isn’t loud or annoying. It provides just the right amount of air flow as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I use it to circulate more air in my computer tower
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a while ago, still runs - helps the computer from overheating since I live in a hot state with no AC. Been doing great making sure I don't get dust/heat accumulating in my tower. Love iiitt. Less cat hair = more gaming
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! It puts out good air for its ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It puts out good air for its size and it's really quiet. I work in a room with another desk 10ft. from me and they cant hear it! I love the USB plug in since all my wall plugs are being used. The size is great. I was afraid it was going to be too small but I'm very pleased with its "footprint" or how much (or should I say little) space it takes up on my desk. 10 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific little fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific little fan. Originally torn, because I wanted a second 6" fan, but the dual speed intrigued me. I am glad I bought it. Great airflow from either speed but I anticipate I'll get great dual purpose use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Adler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quiet fan as I work in a large office and share desk/work space with others. I needed something small that could fit a limited space area but that would cool the air, and this fan did the trick. I had tried a couple others prior to this and they were too noisy or just did not work. I use this fan daily and it works exactly like I need it too.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ*99*

customer_reviews.title: Great air production as well
customer_reviews.text: Used this for one day so far, very impressed. Have it hooked up to a USB battery pack and it doesn't use much power at all and is quiet. Great air production as well. I would definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for any desk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and the low speed is silent and will cool you off. High speed is also quiet, you won’t hear it from a few feet away and moves a good amount of air. Plugs into any USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Malik

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, powerful and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan every day at my desk at work. This is designed well, plugs into USB port on laptop dock, turns off/on when my computer is there, and provides two speeds of air. Keeps me nice and cool with very little noise.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Compact
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work. It's a great little fan with minimal noise. Is enough to blow some of the air conditioned air around when I come in from walking from the parking garage. I did accidentally leave it run all day and overnight until I came back into the office and there were no issues. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W George

customer_reviews.title: Plugs into USB port not wall. I was skeptical at first but set up works well.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size in desk in office. Stylish looking (for an inexpensive fan). Plugs into USB port not wall. I was skeptical at first but set up works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office with many other individuals. Everyone complains about how cold the office is, but I'm always hot. This fan was the perfect solution. Super quiet and moves plenty of air. The USB power source is very convenient. Excellent investment in my comfort at work!!!
customer_reviews.author: kcs

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to say like many others— it is a great quiet fan. Being an older female— sometimes you need some extra air flow.. This fan serves that purpose without taking a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: P. favretto

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Great desktop fan for work. Very happy with this fan. My job doesn't allow electrical items that plug into a socket but USB is ok. The 2 speeds are perfect for my needs. Low for when I need ultra quiet and a nice breeze. High for when I need a little more cooling. The high isn't very loud in a normal office environment. But it may be too loud if your job is library quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! Works great! Very powerful for its size. Also very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lagomarsino

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Super Poor Shipping Amazon delivered to the wrong address, AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, Super Poor Shipping Amazon delivered to the wrong address, AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, and cooling. Works better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: Plug it in and it works. VERY quiet, even on the high setting. Does exactly what i need it to. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Iama Techie

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan. I have been using it for a couple of months and so far it is still working even though it is probably made in China. It is super quite and does provide good strong air. The USB is a good option since I use this as a desk fan.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and plenty powerful for the office
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. Quiet and powerful for the price. I will probably order at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hake

customer_reviews.title: Desk USB fan.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend to use while he’s on his laptop. He loves it. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to help keep electronics cool. Extremely quiet. Powered directly by USB port. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: My office is extremely uncomfortable with no air circulation. I looked into many fans and based on reviews chose this one. So glad I did. Quiet and effective!!! So happy o made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Koutsogiannis

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for the money I spent on it. Not too loud. I can sleep while it's working all night :) it's summer...
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: SUPER QUIET LITTLE FAN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan because I needed a quiet fan for my desktop at work. I read the reviews and decided on this fan with some reservations (mainly because it is USB powered). I have absolutely no complaints. The fan is SO QUIET! The fan that I had on my desk was so loud it was distracting, but I needed it. So I took my chances and ordered this! If your on the fence, don't be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great air movement, poor noise.
customer_reviews.text: Fan motor makes light humming noise at any speed.... Pushes a lot of air and the fan blades themselves are very quiet. I wish the motor didn't make that noise when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn L.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Runs on a battery so highly portable. Puts out quite a bit of air and is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: R Paq

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Small and quiet for those bodies wanting a slight breeze for sleeping it is perfect. Small enough for hotel use.
customer_reviews.author: Pd's Review

customer_reviews.title: Quiet with plenty of flow.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little fan. I use out several times a day with very little noise and plenty of output.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fan that doesn't make much noise at all, but cold quickly and efficiently. It was definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little fan!
customer_reviews.text: So very quiet with two speed settings. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: charless11

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, quiet, and mild
customer_reviews.text: Although I ended up returning this fan due to my preference for a very strong breeze, the customer service I received was exceptional. This fan is sleek and quiet. I loved the fact you can choose the blade color. Happy with my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. The size is perfect for my desk and it works off my computer so I do not need an outlet near by (which is not convenient at my desk). It provides so much power that so far, I only keep it on the low setting.
customer_reviews.author: mydogrunsmylife

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little desk fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little desk fan. It is perfect for what I needed and is nice and quiet so it isn't distruptive at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jlf

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great little USB powered desk fan. You won't do any better for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ragetrip

customer_reviews.title: bought it for a co-worker at work and I haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: bought it for a co-worker at work and I haven't heard her complain about how hot she is. so it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: pedikeensTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: great fan worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Fan is very quiet, Works well has two speeds, great fan worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Posty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working desk
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is suppose to. Perfect for working desk. Silent and good air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Best fan ever. Use it under my desk at work, is very quite and keeps me cool
customer_reviews.author: Joel Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great way to cool you down at work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to keep cool at work. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Larry S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan! Use on my desk at work
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan! Use on my desk at work. Very quiet - neighboring cubes cannot hear it. High speed moves enough air to cool off after lunch time workouts. The low speed is nice for staying comfortable on warm days when the A/C isn't quite doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: dbh1234

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought it to keep my PlayStation cool. It works so well that I plan on buying another one to bring with me to work. The fan powerful,quiet, and even looks kind of cool. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Master Shake

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Nice little desk fan. So quiet I forget to turn it off because I can't hear it.
customer_reviews.author: ReneMichaels

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan. It has two speeds, and the low setting is fine for me most of the time. I liked it so much that I bought another one for my daughter. She's thrilled with it too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Piacenza

customer_reviews.title: Good desk fan
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet and blows air, as promised. Two speeds are better than one.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I had been looking for. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I had been looking for. Plugs into USB port or I have the plug from my phone that works on this to plug into the wall. Is very quiet and put out a lot of air for the size it is.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: The fan has no power at all. It has two speeds and the higher of the two is less than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: JPH New York

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me cool
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a small desk fan due to being hot at his office. The quality is great and it's reliable. He says it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: karatemomma

customer_reviews.title: I can breathe at work and nobody complains about the noise.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for work. It plugs into my computer easily. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Husband

customer_reviews.title: I have three
customer_reviews.text: All three fans are great. been working for over a year and no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Thompson

customer_reviews.title: great little fan
customer_reviews.text: great little fan. i'm a nurse and constantly running around, awesome to come back to the computer and feel a strong breeze. lasts a long time. amazing quality and good size
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day on my desk at home and I love it. Had it almost a year and it works super well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Like the two speeds and moves the air
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about the almost all plastic design but works well. Like the two speeds and moves the air well
customer_reviews.author: Carl Warych

customer_reviews.title: The design is perfect for my desk set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my desk at work. It is exactly what I needed. The design is perfect for my desk set up, and it is very quiet. The two settings work great. Low setting for circulating the air, and a high setting for cooling off. Great little fan.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet on high mode
customer_reviews.text: Day two with the fan on my desk and it's doing what I bought it for. Super quiet on high mode, but, in low mode, there's a bit of a rattle...which, still beats sitting here soaked in sweat
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Quiet little fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan was exactly what I needed in an office setting. It is very, very quiet even on the high setting! Nice and compact and steady sitting on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Patti F

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like these cute little fans - we'll see how long they last
customer_reviews.author: TTD

customer_reviews.title: Best desk fan that I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This fan is incredibly quiet, while providing a great air flow
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fan is super quiet and blows very well for a desk top fan.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a night stand right beside you in
customer_reviews.text: Solid little fan just it doesn’t blow that hard. Good for a night stand right beside you in bed
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this little fan.. quiet but powerful to keep the hot flashes away..
customer_reviews.author: mm2112

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet...
customer_reviews.text: This is not quiet. On the low setting there was a clicking sound that interrupted my work. I had to return it as to not interrupt other people at work
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for desk at work
customer_reviews.text: Loved that fan came in my favorite colors...Black and Red and that it comes in two speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jo

customer_reviews.title: Quite, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work and share an office. Really good fan and not loud.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my fan at work, especially when the boiler is on, thanks a million
customer_reviews.author: Chiquita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this personal fan ! It’s great to sleep to
customer_reviews.author: mike langum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! It's quiet and works well plugged into laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Puts out the right amount of air for a desk fan. Dead quiet on low, I always forget to turn it off when I leave work because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Has two speeds and is powered by the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, and enough power
customer_reviews.text: Nice quiet fan for my office cubicle. Runs really well and is pretty strong
customer_reviews.author: Kev P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome. I never know its on. Going to purchase another one for my Texas home.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Snow

customer_reviews.title: It works great for the office
customer_reviews.text: It works great for the office. It's quiet and is keeping me cool so far. Hopefully it works this well during the summer months in south Texas.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: The fan does exactly as expected! Two speed settings, runs very quietly and looks pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite desk fan of all time! Second time buying it! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far works great, puts out a good amount of air and is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: amanda grady

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, good airflow, pretty quiet
customer_reviews.text: Working perfectly for my needs. I am using it to cool a. Plugged this into one of the USB ports on the appliance, set it to max speed and temperatures dropped by 20 degrees C as reported by the appliances internal thermal sensors. It's nearly silent on low speed and bearable on the high speed. Actually, the fan on my Dell PowerConnect 2824 is louder than this fan on high speed. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The girl I office with was amazed that we couldn't even hear it when it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a fan. I share a space out in the open so it had to be quiet. It needed to be small. I wanted to be able to plug it into my desk topI read the reviews but I was skeptical. The girl I office with was amazed that we couldn't even hear it when it was running. It has two speeds, it is small, it is light and it really moves the air. I couldn't be more pleased!!! It is perfect for what I needed it for. Not crazy about the red blades but we can't have everything now can we?!? I would give it more stars if I could. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Mattioni

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief for Hot Flashes!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite little fan that can go from room to room with me if I need it to. The USB input will plug into my portable charger when I'm not around an electrical outlet (such as when camping), and it works great with a wall adapter if I need it when working at the computer or in the kitchen. There are two speeds, and it doesn't make very much noise at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dsrtgrl7

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: *Update: Upgraded from 3 to 5 stars. I didn't contact the seller but they read my review and instantly sent a new fan with the red blade. Incredible customer service. Fan works great and is quiet. Perfect for my desk at work where my boss likes the office to be as hot as the face of the sun. This works well and is pretty quiet. But, it’s all black - not black with a red blade which is what I wanted. Would give 5 stars if it matched the picture
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: Very Quite
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Amazon prime day for a great price. Runs off of USB from your computer or any of the USB bricks you already have. Does not plug into a wall without the brick which is not included. This is very quite and has just the right amount of a breeze without blowing you and your papers away. I usually run on slow speed but high speed also is quite. Does tilt but sometimes doesn't like to stay tilted.
customer_reviews.author: TL Lenahan

customer_reviews.title: On low it is the perfect amount of air movement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk at work. I cannot stand a constant hum and this fan makes no noise. I can't even tell its on other than the air moving. I placed it under my desk as it gets warm under there due to my computer being there. On low it is the perfect amount of air movement. On low I can feel it blowing but it isn't like a hurricane. I haven't needed to turn it on high yet. I definitely recommend this fan!
customer_reviews.author: cook

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a year now and I love it. I keep it plugged into the USB port in my office computer. When the ladies in the office insist on cranking up the heat, I turn this on to keep myself cool. I usually keep it on the floor but it is quiet enough that I can keep it on the desk if I want to and still use my phone and talk to clients.
customer_reviews.author: David Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Puts out more air than a similar fan I have the same size but uses less power overnight on my powerbank than that other fan too! Can't go wrong with this. Only thing is the blade guard is a little big and you can easily manage to accidently slip a finger tip in the blade if grabbed just right.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan, just needs more powerful air movement.
customer_reviews.text: If it pushed more air it would be perfect. I ended up getting a multi-speed, dual muffin fan using USB to keep my laptop cool when running GPU-intensive programs. I'm keeping the fan to give to my daughter for her comfort, not to cool electronics.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, I bought another
customer_reviews.text: I keep this little fan on my computer desk and it makes a huge difference to my comfort level. It's quiet, as fans go and the two speeds are plenty to cool me down in record time. I've had the first one for about 3 months, so fingers crossed that it continues to work for years to come. Why didn't I think of getting this sooner??
customer_reviews.author: SE

product_meta.title: CAMTOP Desk USB Fan with 2 Speed 5 Inches Small Quiet Table Personal Fan for Home and Office
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFeatures 
* Ultra-quiet design desk fan. 
* 360° up and down adjustable usb fan. 
* With control switch, 2 adjustable speeds (Low/High ) powerful fan. 
* The motor is made by DC brushless technique, lower power quiet fan. 
* Special structure design small desk fan, more stable and stronger, can easily sits on any flat surface. 
* The classic black and transparent color combo makes it stand out and cool. Great fan for your work desk. 
* It is made of quality plastic, lightweight and durable, continuous using with long life. 
* Occupy small room, smart shape, cool and soft wind. 
* Powered by USB with a 3.9 feet(1.2M) cord, you can have the fan running anywhere - connect it to your desktop computer or notebook, and power bank or DC power plug (not included). 
* No matter where you choose to use the it, you can always stay cool and fresh with our small fan, simply plug it into your USB port and switch it on for instant use. 
* Suitable for gift, office, home, dorm, study, library, games room, camping etc. 

Specifications 
*Power: USB plug 
*Material: PP and ABS plastic 
*Size: 180*105*165mm (approx) 
*N.W.: 280G 
*Voltage: DC 5V 
*Power consumption: 2.5±0.25W 
*Power cord length: 1.2M 

What’s in the box 
1 x USB desk fan 
1 x USB cable 

Remark: In order to prevent fingerprints, there is a thin membrane on the logo, please tear it when you are going to use the fan
feature_bullets: Small Desk Fan, wont’s take much space, it is small quiet and powerful fan, perfect for Office, Home, Dorm, Library, Game room, Camping, Outdoor etc.
Ultra Quiet Fan, the motor of the desktop fan is made by DC brushless technique, add four Anti-vibration pads make it more quiet and keep it from moving.

Powerful USB Fan, every desk usb fan with 2 settings of the air flow speed Low/High switch, can be adjusted according to your demand, 360° up and down head angle to get airflow from different directions.
Quality Personal Fan, each usb personal fan is made of firm, durable and lightweight plastic, continuous using with long life. Unique design and special black and red color combo makes you stand out.
Universal Office Fan, this usb office fan is powered by a 3.9ft USB cable which can connects to a computer, laptop, power bank or other USB outlet to make you cooling.
